charges.charge_disposition: Count 1: Probation with supervision for TWO (2) YEARS. Fine of $500.00 and special assessment of $10.00. COUNT 2: Probation with supervision for TWO (2) YEARS to run concurrently with term assessed in Count 1. Fine of $500.00 and special assessment of $25.00. COUNT 3: Fine of $500.00 and special assessment of $5.00. (1)
